short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will change the fonts of Sindhi Wikipedia

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The standard fonts for Sindhi Wikipedia are not good, and hard to read sindhi language, this extension will change the display fonts in your browser to a standard sindhi fonts like MB Lateefi 2.0 or MB lateefi 0.1, if these fonts are not installed then pre-defined fonts will be displayed.
